seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is a digital adoption platform that provides enterprises with a no-code editor to create in-app guidance on any application that looks 100% native.

pricing_models.description: Whatfix pricing is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees.
pricing_models.price: Customized, based on application and users

pricing_models.description: Starting at $39 per month, suitable for small-scale use

buyer_research.name: Sophos
buyer_research.description: Sophos Limited is a British security software and hardware company. It develops and markets managed security services and cybersecurity software and hardware.
goals: Provide innovative, adaptive, AI-driven solutions and proven expertise

competitors.name: WalkMe
pros: Boost digital adoption at scale with confidence
WalkMe is a digital adoption platform that organizations use for delivering onboarding experiences to improve the adoption of their mobile and web applications.
cons: WalkMe is a comprehensive digital adoption platform designed for large companies with a big headcount
differentiators: WalkMe is a digital adoption platform that overlays on any application, identifying where workflows break and providing personalized guidance and automation

competitors.name: Pendo
pros: Provide training inside your software applications
Pendo helps improve employee productivity and optimize processes across your software applications, so you can maximize ROI on your workplace technology.
cons: Pendo is a digital adoption platform that relies on analytics, AI, and automation — so you can empower productive, happy employees.
differentiators: Pendo is the only intelligent digital adoption platform that relies on analytics, AI, and automation — so you can empower productive, happy employees.

Will Whatfix's digital adoption platform be compatible with our Sophos Firewall software?

How does Whatfix address data security and compliance concerns?
What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing Whatfix's digital adoption platform?
How will Whatfix's solution impact our existing employee onboarding and training processes?
Can Whatfix's platform handle the scale and complexity of our enterprise cybersecurity operations?
How does Whatfix's pricing model accommodate our large user base and multiple applications?
What kind of support and resources will Whatfix provide for implementation and ongoing maintenance?
objections: We're not sure if Whatfix's digital adoption platform is the right fit for our cybersecurity needs.
We're concerned about the cost and ROI of implementing Whatfix's solution.
We're not convinced that Whatfix's platform can integrate seamlessly with our existing infrastructure.
We're worried about the level of effort required to customize and implement Whatfix's solution.
We're not sure if Whatfix's solution will be able to keep up with our fast-paced and evolving cybersecurity landscape.
We're concerned about the potential disruption to our existing workflows and processes.
We're not convinced that Whatfix's platform is scalable enough to meet our enterprise needs.
We're worried about the potential risks and security vulnerabilities of implementing a new digital adoption platform.

messages.content: Hello, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I'm excited to learn more about Sophos Firewall's goals and challenges. Can you start by telling me a little bit about your role and what you're hoping to achieve in the cybersecurity space?

Hi, thanks for having me. I'm Joe Levy, the head of cybersecurity at Sophos Firewall. We're focused on defending organizations from inevitable cyberattacks and providing innovative, adaptive, AI-driven solutions and proven expertise. Our biggest challenge right now is staying ahead of the evolving threat landscape and ensuring our employees are equipped to effectively use our cybersecurity solutions.

That's a great overview, Joe. It sounds like employee onboarding and training are critical components of your cybersecurity strategy. Can you walk me through your current process for onboarding new employees and getting them up to speed on your cybersecurity solutions?

Yeah, it's a manual process right now. We have a dedicated team that creates training materials and conducts in-person training sessions. It's time-consuming and doesn't always result in consistent outcomes. We've looked at digital adoption platforms in the past, but we're not sure if they can meet the unique needs of our cybersecurity operations.

I understand your concerns. We've worked with several enterprise cybersecurity organizations and understand the importance of tailoring our solution to meet your specific needs. Can you tell me more about what you're looking for in a digital adoption platform? What are your must-haves and nice-to-haves?

We need a platform that can integrate seamlessly with our existing infrastructure and provide a high level of customization to meet our specific use cases. We're also concerned about data security and compliance, so we need a platform that can address those concerns. ROI is also a key factor for us - we need to be able to demonstrate a clear return on investment.

I completely understand. We've designed our platform to be highly customizable and scalable, so we can meet the unique needs of your organization. We also have robust security and compliance features in place to ensure the integrity of your data. In terms of ROI, we've seen our customers experience significant reductions in training time and costs, as well as improved employee productivity and retention. Can you tell me more about your decision-making process and timeline for implementing a digital adoption platform?

We have a committee that will be involved in the decision-making process, including our CISO, CTO, and head of HR. We're looking to make a decision within the next 6-8 weeks. We're also considering other digital adoption platforms, including WalkMe and Pendo.

Thank you for sharing that information. I'd like to provide a customized demo of our platform and show you how we can meet your specific needs. We can also provide case studies and ROI data from similar organizations to help inform your decision. Would that be something you'd be interested in?
Yes, that sounds like a great next step. I'm looking forward to seeing how Whatfix can help us address our employee onboarding and training challenges.

pain_points: staying ahead of the evolving threat landscape
ensuring employees are equipped to effectively use cybersecurity solutions
manual process for onboarding new employees
getting employees up to speed on cybersecurity solutions
objections: not sure if digital adoption platforms can meet unique needs of cybersecurity operations
concerns about data security and compliance
success_indicators: demonstrate a clear return on investment
significant reductions in training time and costs

features.name: In-app Guidance
features.description: Whatfix provides in-app guidance to enterprises, enabling them to create contextual and personalized guidance for their users.

features.name: Digital Adoption Platform
features.description: Whatfix offers a digital adoption platform that helps enterprises accelerate digital transformation, drive user adoption, and maximize technology investments.

features.name: Product Analytics
features.description: Whatfix's product analytics capabilities enable enterprises to track user behavior, identify pain points, and optimize their applications for better user adoption.

features.name: User Onboarding
features.description: Whatfix's user onboarding feature streamlines the onboarding process, reducing training time and costs, and improving employee productivity and retention.

features.name: Performance Support
features.description: Whatfix's performance support feature provides users with real-time support and guidance, enabling them to effectively use cybersecurity solutions.

features.name: No-code Editor
features.description: Whatfix's no-code editor allows enterprises to create custom guidance and workflows without requiring any coding expertise.

features.name: Native Integration
features.description: Whatfix's platform integrates seamlessly with existing infrastructure, providing a high level of customization and flexibility.

features.name: Security and Compliance
features.description: Whatfix's platform has robust security and compliance features in place to ensure the integrity of customer data.

messages.content: Hello everyone, thank you for taking the time to discuss how Whatfix can help address Sophos Firewall's pain points. I'm excited to demonstrate our digital adoption platform and showcase how it can help you stay ahead of the evolving threat landscape and ensure your employees are equipped to effectively use your cybersecurity solutions.

Thank you for having us. We're looking for a solution that can help us streamline our onboarding process and improve employee productivity. Can you walk us through how Whatfix can help us achieve that?

Absolutely. Let me start by demonstrating our User Onboarding feature. This feature streamlines the onboarding process, reducing training time and costs, and improving employee productivity and retention. We've seen our customers experience significant reductions in training time and costs, as well as improved employee productivity and retention.

I'd like to show you how our In-app Guidance feature provides contextual and personalized guidance to your users. This feature enables your employees to effectively use your cybersecurity solutions, reducing the risk of human error and ensuring compliance with security protocols.
That's impressive. But how does Whatfix ensure the integrity of our data? We have robust security and compliance requirements that need to be met.

I completely understand. Our platform has robust security and compliance features in place to ensure the integrity of customer data. We've worked with several enterprise organizations and understand the importance of meeting their security and compliance requirements. We'd be happy to provide more information on our security features and compliance certifications.

Let me show you how our Product Analytics feature can help you track user behavior, identify pain points, and optimize your applications for better user adoption. This feature provides valuable insights that can help you refine your onboarding process and improve employee productivity.

I'm interested in how Whatfix can help us with our current manual onboarding process. Can you walk us through how your platform can help us customize our onboarding process to meet our specific needs?

Our No-code Editor feature allows you to create custom guidance and workflows without requiring any coding expertise. This feature provides a high level of customization and flexibility, enabling you to tailor our platform to meet your specific onboarding needs. We've seen our customers experience significant improvements in employee productivity and retention by leveraging this feature.

I'd like to mention that we've worked with similar organizations in the cybersecurity industry, such as XYZ Corporation, and have helped them achieve significant reductions in training time and costs, as well as improved employee productivity and retention. We believe our platform can provide similar value to Sophos Firewall.
That's impressive. Can you provide some customizations or personalized features that can address our specific pain points?

We'd be happy to provide customizations to meet your specific needs. We can work with you to develop a tailored solution that addresses your pain points and provides a clear return on investment. We're committed to delivering a solution that meets your needs and helps you achieve your goals.

Before we conclude, I'd like to provide some additional resources that may be helpful in your evaluation process. We have a case study on our website that outlines how we've helped similar organizations in the cybersecurity industry achieve significant improvements in employee productivity and retention. We also have a demo environment that you can access to get hands-on experience with our platform.

In terms of next steps, we'd like to offer a customized trial of our platform to help you evaluate how our solution can meet your specific needs. We believe this will provide a clear understanding of how our platform can help you achieve your goals and provide a clear return on investment. What are your thoughts on this proposal?

messages.content: Hello everyone, thank you for taking the time to discuss pricing today. I'm excited to review the features and benefits of our digital adoption platform that we demoed last week. Our goal is to help you streamline your onboarding process, reduce training time and costs, and improve employee productivity and retention.
Yes, we're interested in understanding how your platform can help us achieve our goals. Can you walk us through your pricing models and how they align with our needs?

Absolutely. We have three pricing models to choose from. Our Flat Fee + User License Fees model is customized based on the application and users, with a yearly or monthly duration. We also have a Basic Plan starting at $39 per month, suitable for small-scale use, and a Free Plan with 30 credits, suitable for very small-scale use. Which one of these models resonates with you?
I'm concerned about the integrity of our data. How does Whatfix ensure the security and compliance of our data?

I completely understand your concern. Our platform has robust security and compliance features in place to ensure the integrity of customer data. We can provide more information on our security protocols and compliance certifications if needed.
We're working with a budget constraint of $50,000 for this project. Can you provide a customized plan that fits within our budget?

I understand your budget constraint. I think our Basic Plan with some customization to meet your specific needs would be a good fit. We can provide a detailed breakdown of the costs and ensure that it fits within your budget. We've worked with similar organizations in the cybersecurity industry and have seen significant reductions in training time and costs, as well as improved employee productivity and retention.
We're looking to implement a digital adoption platform within the next 6-8 weeks. Can you accommodate our timeline?

Yes, we can definitely accommodate your timeline. We've worked with organizations with similar timelines and have a proven track record of delivering results quickly. We can provide a detailed implementation plan and ensure that our platform is aligned with your timeline.
We're interested in the Flat Fee + User License Fees model. Can you provide more details on how it works and what the costs would be for our organization?

Our Flat Fee + User License Fees model is a customized model that takes into account the complexity of your application and the number of users. We can provide a detailed breakdown of the costs, but as a rough estimate, we're looking at a flat fee of $10,000 per year, plus $5 per user per month. We can also provide a discount for a yearly commitment.

Our KPIs for success are demonstrating a clear return on investment, improving employee productivity and retention, and reducing training time and costs. Can you speak to how your platform can help us achieve these KPIs?

Yes, our platform is designed to help organizations like yours achieve these KPIs. We've seen significant reductions in training time and costs, as well as improved employee productivity and retention, with our customers. We can provide case studies and ROI analysis to support our claims.
Our financial priority is to reduce costs and improve efficiency. Can you speak to how your platform can help us achieve these priorities?

Our platform is designed to help organizations like yours reduce costs and improve efficiency. We've worked with similar organizations in the cybersecurity industry and have seen significant reductions in training time and costs, as well as improved employee productivity and retention. We can provide a detailed breakdown of the costs and ROI analysis to support our claims.

I think that's all the information we need to move forward. We can provide a customized plan that fits within your budget and meets your needs. We're confident that our platform can help you achieve your goals. What are the next steps from your perspective?

messages.content: Hi everyone, thank you for taking the time to discuss the next steps for implementing Whatfix's digital adoption platform at Sophos Firewall. I understand that we've had a few discussions previously, and I'm excited to move forward with the project. Can you walk me through your thoughts on the pricing and package we discussed earlier?

Yes, we did discuss the pricing, and while we're interested in moving forward, we do have some concerns about data security and compliance. Can you assure us that your platform meets our stringent security requirements?

I completely understand your concerns, and I'm happy to report that our platform has robust security and compliance features in place to ensure the integrity of your data. We've worked with several enterprise cybersecurity organizations and understand the importance of tailoring our solution to meet your specific needs. We can provide you with our security protocols and compliance certifications for your review.

That's good to hear. We also need to ensure that the platform can integrate seamlessly with our existing infrastructure. Can you provide more details on how you plan to customize the solution to meet our specific needs?

Absolutely. We'd be happy to provide customizations to meet your specific needs. We can work with you to develop a tailored solution that addresses your pain points and provides a clear return on investment. We've seen our customers experience significant reductions in training time and costs, as well as improved employee productivity and retention. I'd like to offer a customized plan that fits within your budget constraint of $50,000.
I'd like to understand more about the ROI calculator you provided earlier. Can you walk us through how you arrived at those numbers?

Of course. Our ROI calculator takes into account the current manual onboarding process and the time and costs associated with it. We then compare that to the streamlined onboarding process provided by our platform, which reduces training time and costs, and improves employee productivity and retention. We can provide you with a detailed breakdown of the costs and ROI analysis, and I'd be happy to answer any questions you may have.

We'd like to move forward with the project, but we need to discuss the contract terms and procurement concerns. Can you provide us with a draft contract that outlines the scope of work, timelines, and payment terms?

I'd be happy to provide you with a draft contract that meets your requirements. In terms of procurement concerns, I'd like to offer a discount of 10% on the total project cost if you're able to commit to a yearly contract. Additionally, we can provide a phased implementation approach to ensure a smooth rollout of the platform. What are your thoughts on this?
We'll need to review the contract and discuss it with our legal team. Can you give us a week to get back to you on this?

That sounds perfect. I'll send over the draft contract by the end of the day, and we can schedule a follow-up call to discuss any questions or concerns you may have. Thank you again for your time, and I look forward to moving forward with the project.
